Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngeke ubathole abantu abakholwa kuMvelinqangi nasosukwini lokugcina bethanda labo abaphikisa uMvelinqangi nesithunywa sakhe noma ngabe ngoyise noma amadodana abo noma abafowabo noma umndeni wabo, labo waloba ezinhliziyweni zabo ukholo wayesebaseka ngomoya ovela kuyena futhi abafake ezivandeni okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula bayohlala khona ingunaphakade, uMvelinqangi uyothokoza ngabo futhi bayothokoza ngaye, labo bayiqembu likaMvelinqangi ngempela iqembu likaMvelinqangi bona bangabaphumeleleyo
Kudumisa uMvelinqangi konke okusemazulwini nako konke okusemhlabeni futhi yena uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani

Yena uyilowo owakhipha labo abangakholwanga phakathi kwabantu bencwadi ezindlini zabo (emizini yabo) ekuhlanganeni kokuqala anicabanganga ukuthi bayophuma futhi babecabanga ukuthi izinqaba zezindlu zabo ziyobavikela kuMvelinqangi, manjalo uMvelinqangi weza kubona evela lapho babengalindele khona futhi wafaka uvalo ezinhliziyweni zabo bebhidliza izindlu zabo ngezandla zabo kanye nezandla zabakholwayo ngakho-ke yalekani Oh Bantu abanamehlo
Futhi ukube kwakungesingenxa yokuthi wabanqumela uMvelinqangi ukudingiswa wayezobajezisa emhlabeni futhi okwabo empilweni ezayo yisijeziso somlilo
